title: One of Hawaii's Great Golf Courses Can Be Yours for the Day at four seasons resort lanaiTravelandtourworld.com
text:
One of Hawaii’s Great Golf Courses Can Be Yours for the Day at four seasons resort lanai
What golfer hasn’t dreamed of having his or her own golf course? No crowds, no waiting for tee times, open just to friends, the professionals there to help only you.That dream can now be a reality at the Manele Golf Course at Four Seasons Resort Lanai, only nine miles from Maui.
The Make Manele Your Own golf experience is a dream-come-true opportunity to possess the best of Hawaii golf, where every hole on a magnificent Jack Nicklaus Signature design offers heavenly views of the Pacific.
One of the elite venues in the game, the breathtaking Manele Golf Course layout is built on lava outcroppings, featuring three holes on the cliffs. Its signature hole is No. 12, a par 3 where the tee area is 150 feet (46 metres) above the crashing surf, challenging golfers with a dramatic shot to the green.
Having earned numerous awards since opening in 1993, the Manele Golf Course is the #2 ranked resort course among all Hawaii golf destinations (Golfweek magazine) and #32 among all resort courses in the United States. Four Seasons Resort Lanai also has earned the Premier Golf Resorts Gold Medal from GOLF magazine, and with recent improvements made to the overall golf experience at the Manele Golf Course, golfers continue to discover something new every time they play.
The Make Manele Your Own golf experience is priced at USD 10,000 and includes:
Private access to all golf facilities for up to 20 golfers
Unlimited golf on the Manele Golf Course
Ground transportation to and from the golf course
Morning cocktails
Individual amenity packages for all golfers
Golf clinic and lessons with the professional staff, as desired
Luxurious lunch reception at VIEWS restaurant
Custom-fit Foot-Joy golf shoes for the group
Commemorative photos for all in the group
“Having a secluded island seemingly all to yourself is something magical no golfer will ever forget,” says Scott Ashworth, the Manele Director of Golf, who is recognised as one of the most distinguished golf professionals in Hawaii. “You’ll enjoy an intimate, personalised golf experience with an incredible bonus — stunning views from every hole that just may make you take your eye off the ball.”
The Manele staff of PGA golf professionals will be on hand all day, available for golf tips and course knowledge before, during and after play. Each guest will have unlimited access to iced towels, logoed caps, cold beverages, and snacks during play. Even the sunscreen is included.
Source:-Four Seasons
